p: In spite of the prevalence of negative effects of climatic variables on amphibians and reptiles, it is important to note that climate change can also affect some species positively. Positive effects include range expansions in mountain areas [ 72] and into higher latitudes [ 73], increased winter survival of montane species [ 74] and faster development [ 75]. Care should be taken that studies and analyses are not biased towards the expectation that results will indicate a negative effect of climate change.
